title: English In The House
content: Do you want to get better at learning English?! Well, to achieve this goal, you'll have to learn new words and practice using them with those around you. If you can't find anyone to practice around you, all you need to do is to log on to 'GET BILINGUAL' and find a pal to chat with you. Have fun, and keep learning!

title: OÙ SON LES FRANCOPHONES? (French)
content: Parlez vous Français?! Nous les francophones sommes ici pour vous aider.

title: Guten Tag! (German)
content: Du bist sehr wilkommen hier meine freunde....

title: Holla Amiga (Spanish)
content: Quieres aprender todos los idiomas del mundo? Este es el lugar para ir ...!

title: De Lisboa com amor ... (Portuguese)
content: Oi pessoal! Estou aqui para me divertir aprendendo idiomas e fazer novos amigos.

title: Hakuna matata! (Swahili)
content: Habari wananchi wa ulimwengu! Je! Kuna mtu tayari kwa kiswahili zaidi?

title: Ni Hao! (Chinese)
content: 世界公民你好！ 有人准备好再来点中文了吗？ --Shìjiè gōngmín nǐ hǎo! Yǒurén zhǔnbèi hǎo zàilái diǎn zhōngwénle ma?

title: earabiun faqat! (Arabic)
content: مرحبا مواطني العالم! هل هناك من هو مستعد لمزيد من العربية؟ --Marhaban muatini alealami! hal hunak man hu mustaeidun limazid min alearabiati?

title: Sussurri da Venezia...(Italian)
content: Ciao cittadini del mondo! Qualcuno è pronto per un po' di italiano in più?!

title: Hallo liewe mense (Afrikaans)
content: Hoe gaan dit met almal? Laat ons saamstaan en probleme oplos.

title: こんにちは素敵な人 --Kon'nichiwa sutekinahito (Japanese)
content: 気軽に新しい人と出会い、新しい言語を学びましょう。 --Kigaru ni atarashī hito to deai, atarashī gengo o manabimashou.

title: Москва в изобилии (Russian)
content: Ne stesnyaytes' znakomit'sya s novymi lyud'mi i izuchat' novyy yazyk.

title: Ẹ kí lati Eko (Yoruba)
content: Forukọsilẹ, pade eniyan, ki o kọ ẹkọ ohun tuntun.

title: Sannu Mutanen Kirki (Hausa)
content: Yi rajista, sadu da mutane, kuma koya sabon abu.

title: नमस्ते सुंदर लोगों (namaste sundar logon - Hindi)
content: Ham yahaan nae logon se milane aur naee bhaashaen seekhane ke lie hain.
